achievements.name: SportRadar hackathon 2019 winner
achievements.description: Building a sport following chatbot prototype. The service would follow soccer matches in real-time and send notifications about goals. If possible it also searches and attach a short video about the goal. Winner solution.

achievements.name: https://hackyeah.pl/
achievements.description: Building an universal platform for a train based multiplayer train game. The application would allow multiple players to answer railways based questions thus building brand awareness. Finalist solution.

workWithUs.name: Presence
workWithUs.description: We are remote, so we communicate a lot. We don't disappear, we like to give detailed reports of our progress. We like to keep You in the loop. We read emails, we are on slack, we reply as soon as we can.

workWithUs.name: Documentation
workWithUs.description: Sometimes work is not so obvious for future newcomers. We believe in a nicely organized company resources, including documentation. We stress out the importance of that. We like to write a lot.

workWithUs.name: Flexibility
workWithUs.description: Change of plans? We like it! We are always keen to re-estimate problems. If You have just a better idea, we can adapt and iterate fast. We like to pivot too!

workWithUs.name: Money
workWithUs.description: We understand money. We don't aim for fancy solutions, we aim for working solutions. We dedicate our resources under single flag. Our solution would generate value and money for You.

projects.name: Sports chatbot
projects.challenge: Create a facebook integrated chatbot which notifies users on followed events
projects.whatAchieved:
We created a custom chatbot service integrated with different API-s to follow sport events. Our main feature was that the user followed certain soccer fixtures, and he would have been notified in case of goalscoring. Uniqueness of the service was that in the background, the service was trying to pair a video together with the goal details, and if possible was including a short clip.

We created the chatbot engine with dialogflow, and integrated it with facebook messenger. The chatbot was using google cloud functions and pubsub engine, to activate endpoints and acquire event information. In case of an event, the background function would be triggered and push the relevant data to the facebook messenger of the subscribed users.
